item.title: Blocks Per Second Calculator
item.description: ⚠️ WARNING: The old scripting API has been removed on Minecraft Bedrock since march 2022, replaced by the newer and better GameTest Framework. Therefore, this addon doesn’t work on versions 1.18 or higher. This script lets you calculate how many blocks you place every second! You can customise the time between every update: 1, 3, 5, 30 or 60 seconds! Singleplayer and Windows 10 only. This addon/script is useful for knowing the average speed of bridging techniques, as it tells you how many blocks you place per second(s).

item.title: Minecraft, but Speed and Jump Progressively Increase
item.description: Minecraft, but Speed and Jump progressively increase: the more you walk and jump, the faster you move and the higher you jump. This addon is very challenging, and with enough walking as well as jumping, you might reach the maximum levels! This addon was inspired by Dream’s “Minecraft, But Speed Rises Every Second” video, except your speed slowly increases every time you move. It can be a fun challenge (although - I’ll admit - quite annoying when your speed gets really high) to try out!
